msg: [CODEC-183] BaseNCodecOutputStream only supports writing EOF on close().

author: pderop
msg: Added a isActive method in the ComponentContext interface, in order to check if a component is enabled or disabled.
We are using the isActive method in ServiceDependencyImpl, when the addingService can't get a service reference because
the bundle context is invalid. And we don't log an exception if the component is not enabled at this time.
